concept.title: How to Use the Video Link cable
concept.shortdesc: How to use the Video Link cable for the GAME BOY.

ul.li: Remove the Extension connector cover (use your fingernail)
Insert the Video Link cable plugs into each of the Game Boys, turn the Power Switch to the "ON" position on both units.

conbody.p:
Things to Remember (Cautions):
Turn the switch to the "ON" position only after connecting the Video Link™ cable plugs to the Game Boy body.
Only software with the 2-player option should be used.
Do not insert different games in the interconnected Game Boys.
Always replace the extension connector cover when you are not using the Video Link™ cable.
